rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0001
rows.name: Irina! Gwin! Thank God you're both all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0002
rows.name: Yeah, we made it back, but...Marcus wasn't so lucky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0003
rows.name: What happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0004
rows.name: He took an enemy missile barrage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0005
rows.name: What? ...He's...gone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0006
rows.name: Listen, Lieutenant—we're going to find that Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0007
rows.name:
And when we do, Marcus will be the first one back
in a brand new, state-of-the-art mim—I promise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_JNK0010
rows.name: Lighten the Mood

rows.label: xs08140150_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest he gets the latest "young and rugged" model.

rows.label: xs08140150_JNK0020
rows.name: Be Optimistic

rows.label: xs08140150_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest he gets the latest "hip and fashionable" model.

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0008
rows.name: Yeah! Something like Gwin, only...a bit more handsome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0009
rows.name:
And maybe little taller?
And slimmer but with bigger muscles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0010
rows.name: Yes, yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0011
rows.name:
Just like Gwin, only taller and slimmer,
and with more muscles on his wings![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0012
rows.name: And more handsome, too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0013
rows.name: Thanks guys. No, seriously—thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0014
rows.name: I like this idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0015
rows.name:
We'll find Marcus the handsomest, strongest,
most un-Gwin-like mim around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0016
rows.name: Oh, you too now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0017
rows.name: So, Colonel—we lost the alien Skell...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0018
rows.name: Well, last I heard we weren't even sure what it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0019
rows.name: Doesn't seem like much of a loss to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0020
rows.name: If only it were that simple...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0021
rows.name: Ma'am?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0022
rows.name:
The important thing is,
we managed to repel the invasion force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0023
rows.name:
We're still alive, and NLA's still standing.
I'll take that as a victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0024
rows.name: Hell yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0025
rows.name: The Colonel's right—we did good here today. We won.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0026
rows.name: Yeah... Yeah, you're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0027
rows.name: So hey, why don't we all go report back to HQ together?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0028
rows.name: Sure—sounds good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0029
rows.name: Actually—Irina, you guys should go on ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0030
rows.name: I have an errand to run with my team first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0031
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0032
rows.name:
Then we'll see you back at headquarters in a bit.
Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0033
rows.name: Let's go check out the hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08140150_MSG0034
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]
